mapper.select: SELECT d.SourceId,d.UniqueCode,c.CompanyName AS 'CompanyId',d.SourceName,d.RValue,sd.DictName AS 'Rank', d.RecordNo,d.Validity,d.Status,d.Longt,d.Lat,d.OutPersonCount,d.AccidentType,d.DeathToll,d.RecordDate FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO d LEFT JOIN TB_BASE_COMPANY_INFO c ON d.CompanyId=c.CompanyId LEFT JOIN TB_SYS_DATADICT sd ON d.Rank=sd.DictId WHERE ${filter}

SELECT ci.* FROM TB_BASE_DANGERSOURCE_INFO di JOIN TB_BASE_PROCESS_UNIT pu ON di.SourceId=pu.SourceId JOIN TB_BASE_EQUIP_INFO ei ON pu.UnitId=ei.UnitId JOIN TB_REL_BASE_COMPANY_CHEMICAL cc ON ei.EquipId=cc.EquipId JOIN TB_BASE_CHEMICAL_INFO ci ON cc.ChemId=ci.ChemId WHERE di.SourceId=#{sourceId}
